data.desc:
• A responsive page that uses the bootstrap classes.
  • Add/update/delete tasks and view the status of the tasks in the charts shown in the page.
  • It uses CakePHP API and returns JSON which contains list of tasks.

• A responsive page that uses angularjs platform.
  • Add/update/delete tasks and view the status of the tasks in the charts shown in the page.
  • It uses CakePHP API and returns JSON which contains list of tasks.

• A map that locates the bootstrap contributors.
  • It uses CakePHP API which fetches the location of contributers.

• Search for nearest movies/restaurants around your location.
  • This page uses HTML 5 Location API.
